Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 26th overall pick, by Syracuse in 1981...
Injured on 4/3/1983 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Earned first career win on 5/15/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1986, winning 2 games with a 1.93 ERA...
Had first career hit on 4/16/1987, off Mike Davis (BC)...
Injured on 5/6/1990 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 6-7 weeks...
Injured on 8/21/1990 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Won World Championship with Syracuse in 1990...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
